verbs.description: As [ARG0: they] [V: did] [ARGM-TMP: last week] [ARGM-ADV: along with the other] networks , ABC led its Monday morning Good Morning America by hyping complaints from Democrats and liberals about the Trump Administration border policy . Correspondent Marcus Moore ’s report even touted a celebrity ’s curse - filled rant at the GOP without acknowledging the profanity .
